resources.string: This app requires Shizuku.\nPlease make sure you have shizuku installed and running.
Force applying MixedAudio may crash some apps, and doing so on system apps may crash your entire system.
Execute raw adb commands, on-demand through intents.
Allow multiple apps to play audio at the same time, or mute specific apps.
Seamlessly downgrade apps to older versions, without re-install.
Use premium themes from the theme store in oppo, oneplus or realme devices for free.
Uninstall unnecessary system apps to remove ads, save battery and improve performance.
Control audio output of individual apps, play on multiple outputs simultaneously, and more!
Open the Shizuku app to ensure there are no warnings.
Select an apk file to be installed as a downgrade.
Pick any premium theme / font / wallpaper from the theme store, then take a short Free Trial.
Intent shell locks for 5 minutes after usage of a wrong access key, to prevent brute force attempts.
Selected item was patched as permanent.
Do not un-mute apps that are being controlled by SoundMaster, while SoundMaster is running.
You can now change volume to configure %1$s as well. Make sure to disable it before you power off the device.
Permission error! Open the shizuku app to learn more.
Switch apps to picture-in-picture mode even if they don\'t allow it. May not support some launchers.
